Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: Sighting Detailsin back yard around 1am when i was struggling with being home from a lung collapse earlier that day, and was as stupid as sounds looking up trying to calm myself down , when i was looking at the starts above my house the brightest thing i have ever seen crossed the star i was looking at, it was around 8 x the size of the stars that was out and easy 20x brighter, it crossed the star i was looking at, stopped, hoovered for a few seconds then changed direcion and went towards my west, it then moved back to wards were it had come from ( direction) , then i ran into house for my phone ( i would nt have run for anything else as just recovering for a lung collapse ) when i tryed to take a pic my mobile was not good enough to do so , but i got to watch it head west again till it just was to far away to see, i would say was around 10mins i got to watch this for and felt totally blessed
Summary: brightest thing i ever seen , caught my eye as crossed star i was looking at
